entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: PranjalKaushik77/shareHub: ShareFile is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for quick transfers of small PDF and text files without authentication. Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase Storage, it allows users to upload files and share links instantly. The project is lightweight, simple, and deployed via Firebase Hosting with GitHub Actions for automation. üöÄ
entry.content: ShareFile is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for quick transfers of small PDF and text files without authentication. Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase Storage, it allows users to upload files and share links instantly. The project is lightweight, simple, and deployed via Firebase Hosting with GitHub Actions for automation. üöÄ
